text: Ahimelech ga helekai, “Go tulumanu dauwa hua Goliath tangada Philistia deenei i dogu baahi, dela ne daaligi kooe i di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Elah. Malaa, tulumanu la deelaa e hii gi di gahu e dugu baahi adu di ‘ephod’. Maa goe e hiihai e kae di maa, la kaina, deelaa hua di mee i dogu baahi i ginei.”21.9 1 Samuel 17.51
